[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Parties & Celebrations” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_one_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIwOCJ9fQ==@” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_one_url” _module_preset=”default” content_font_size=”20px” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Party-Decor-Hire-Parties.png” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We thrive on decorating special parties, whether it’s a 40th outdoor sundowner, elegant 50th birthday, cherished anniversary, or quirky baby shower – we’ve got you covered! Our innovative and creative ideas will transform your party into an unforgettable event that will be talked about for years to come. As a one-stop shop, we not only provide party rentals, but also offer festive helium balloons for instant impact, stylish floral centerpieces, atmospheric fairy lights, and elegant draping to enhance backdrops or cover unsightly areas. Let us make your celebration truly extraordinary with our comprehensive range of party services.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1573px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][lwp_image_carousel gallery_ids=”407,406,405,404,403,402,401,400,399,398,397,396,388,387,386″ slides_show=”4″ show_dots=”off” autoplay_animation=”on” pause_on_hover=”off” infinite_animation=”on” vertical_layout=”off” adaptive_height=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/lwp_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Party SET-UP” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Relax and leave the stress of your event to us. We’ll handle everything from delivering your requirements to the venue, setting up our decor, and ensuring everything is in place for your guests’ arrival. After the event, we’ll coordinate with the venue to promptly remove all items, leaving you with peace of mind. Enjoy your event knowing that every detail is taken care of by our experienced team.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TABLE DÉCOR/Center piece” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Discover our extensive range of table decor options, allowing us to curate flawless table displays featuring captivating centrepieces customized to your preferences and style. Whether your taste leans towards traditional, contemporary, or themed designs, we are adept at transforming your vision into reality.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”VENUE DECOR ” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Does your venue need a makeover?
Our draping services can transform it from dull to dazzling.
Choose from white or black draping to suit your style.
Add instant party vibes with our colorful helium balloons, and enhance the ambiance with fairy lights, bunting, or Chinese lanterns for that extra festive touch.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”FLORAL DISPLAYS” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Count on our expert flower arranging skills to create stunning displays that seamlessly complement your theme, whether it’s for the food table or reception area. Let us bring beauty and elegance to every corner of your event with our exquisite floral arrangements.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Candles and lighting” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Candles offer an enchanting ambiance to any event, and at Party Décor Hire, we provide a cost-effective solution to elevate your atmosphere.

Crafted in-house from recycled materials, our candles not only contribute to the magical ambiance but also offer an economical choice compared to traditional options.

Choose from our selection of pillar candles, available in various heights and two widths: 7.5cm and 11cm. We also offer floating candles to add a unique touch to your decor.

Enhance the ambiance further with our exquisite tea-light votives and candlesticks, essential for creating a captivating atmosphere at your celebration.

Additionally, we offer fairy lights in lengths of 4 meters, 10 meters, and 20 meters, along with the option of uplighters to complete your lighting requirements

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Photo Booth” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” header_font=”|||on|||||” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Elevate your party or celebration with our retro and 360 photo booth experience. Our booths capture every moment, from silly poses to heartfelt embraces, providing lasting memories for you and your guests. With customizable options, instant printing, and digital sharing, the joy of your event is shared far and wide. Let our professional team take care of every detail, ensuring a seamless and fun-filled experience. Contact us today to book your date and add an extra dose of excitement to your party with our photo booth

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
